Server.Name: Welcome to Canada 3
Server.Description:
Welcome to Canada version 3.0 for alpha 17.x.x.x
For more information on this mod please visit the 7 days to Die forum located here: https://7daystodie.com/forums/showthread.php?86541-Welcome-to-Canada
NOTE: Please pre-sync this mod the first time you install. This is a VERY LARGE mod so give it time to install. After the initial download you will only recieve updated files causing must faster loading times than previous versions. Keep auto updates checked.
The following download link is for mod launcher use ONLY! For a direct download link or server admin files, please visit the forum.
